trans-unit.source: The system environment check returned errors. Those errors will affect the functionality and stability of your TYPO3 CMS instance. Please check the install tool "System environment" for all details.

The system environment check returned warnings. Those warnings might have a negative effect on the functionality and stability of your TYPO3 CMS instance. Please check the install tool "System environment" for all details.
The system environment check returned notices. Those should not affect the functionality and stability of your TYPO3 CMS instance. Please check the install tool "System environment" for all details.
%s does not exist and could not be created.
Also note that it should be writable, if it did exist.
Could not fetch version matrix of TYPO3. Maybe this instance is blocked by a firewall?
This version of TYPO3 seems to be a development version. Thus no update information exists.
It seems that this TYPO3 version has never been released. Thus no update information exists.
There is a new version of TYPO3 available, updating is security relevant. Please update to version %s
There is a new version of TYPO3 available. You can update to version %s
The TYPO3 version you're using is not supported anymore. You should update to a supported version.
Automatic update checking failed, please check for updates manually.
The Install Tool is temporarily enabled. Delete the file "%s" when you have finished setting up TYPO3. If not used the Install Tool will be disabled automatically in %s minutes.
